#include <stdio.h> 
#include <string.h>	// strlen(s)
#include <assert.h>
int main() {
	char s[1024];
	while (scanf("%s", s) == 1) {
		int n = (int) strlen(s);
		assert(n <= 1000);
		int f = 0, x = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			char c = s[i];	
			/*
				input "CSIE", 
				s[0] = 'C', s[1] = 'S', ...
			*/
			if (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {
				f = 1, x = x * 10 + c - '0';
			} else {
				if (f)	printf("%d\n", x);
				x = 0, f = 0;
			}				
		}
		if (f)
			printf("%d\n", x);
	}
	return 0;
}
